title: Beachfront plot with fishing licence
details:
Exceptionally well positioned, rectangular beach land with 330 feet of beach frontage. Extending to 1.8 acres, the plot is situated close to the popular tourist resort of Kalpitiya.

This is a beautiful plot with mature coconut trees and stunning views over the Indian Ocean and its breathtaking sunsets. The beach is a golden sandy beach with over 300 feet from the sea to the land.

The land is for sale with a rare opportunity purchase a Madel fishing licence which covers the fishing rights in front of the land and which can generate significant income during the fishing season. The licence is issued by the Department of Fisheries and only people who own the licence can catch fish in the sea within the demarcated lines. Licence ownership is normally passed within the family members; hence it is very rare for a licence to come up for sale .Furthermore, there are three boats and three boat licences included part of the sale.
